capabilities.description: Monitee Agent is able to perform raw I/O operations
capabilities.name: SYS_RAWIO

app_metadata.description: Monitee-agent is a android app based system monitoring tool. See https://monitee.app/get-started/

host_mounts.description: Required to read the OS release information.
Required to read information from disks.
Required to read disk device names.

app_metadata.name: monitee-agent

run_as_context.description: Monitee agent runs as root user.

app_metadata.title: Monitee Agent

attrs.label: Enable Docker Monitoring Mode
attrs.description: Enable to allow monitee-agent to manage Docker Containers on your system.

attrs.label: Enable disks monitoring
attrs.description: Enable to allow monitee-agent to see storage devices on your system.

attrs.label: Devices for temperature monitoring
attrs.description:
Devices to monitor SMART temperature attributes for </br>
Example: </br>
Host Device: /dev/sda </br>
Container Device: /dev/sda

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. Without it, monitee-agent won't be able to monitor network interfaces.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode

The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

ixVolume: Is dataset created automatically by the system.</br>
Host Path: Is a path that already exists on the system.

enum.description: Host Path (Path that already exists on the system)
ixVolume (Dataset created automatically by the system)

1.0.14.readme:
Monitee-agent

Monitee-agent is a cross-platform system monitoring tool.
